text:
[Verse]
City lights they glow
Nighttime starts to show
Everybody's out
No reason to slow

[Verse 2]
Walking down the street
Rhythm in our feet
Strangers passing by
Moments feel so sweet

[Chorus]
Dancing in the glow
Moving with the flow
City never sleeps
Feel the magic grow

[Verse 3]
Neon signs so bright
Stars are taking flight
Music fills the air
Lose track of the night

[Bridge]
Step into the beat
Life feels so complete
Underneath the lights
Hearts begin to meet

[Chorus]
Dancing in the glow
Moving with the flow
City never sleeps
Feel the magic grow
title: City Lights
